subject: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW
body:
FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK
33 LIBERTY STREET, NEW YORK, NY 10045
REF:- PAYMENT CODE: ECB/066
Attention Valued Beneficiary,
This is to acknowledge the receipt of an instructional payment order
in your favor valued at $10.500.000.00, Ten million five hundred
thousand United states dollars from World Bank compensation Office
under the supervision of Mr. Jim Yong Kim, the President/CEO, be
informed that this bank has been mandated by the World Bank
organization to offset your long over-due compensation/inheritance
payment valued  $10.500.000.00 with immediate effect.
To proceed with the release/transfer of your funds as instructed by
World Bank, you are required to furnish us with your below listed
particulars for IMMEDIATE evaluation and processing of payment/funds
transfer in your favor.
(1). Your full name and residential address
(2). Direct cell/mobile phone number
(3). Receiving bank name
(4). Bank address
(5). Your Routing number
(6). Your swift code
(7). Account number
(8). Name of account holder
(9). Your Occupation
Also, do note that you are obligatory to take care of the applicable
PROCESSING/STAMP DUTY FEE totaling $480.00 only and this fee cannot be
deducted from your principal amount neither can it be withdrawn,
because your fund is protected by a hard cover insurance policy which
does not permit any deduction until it's transferred into your bank
account.
Please do provide the above listed information accurately and the
$480.00 applicable PROCESSING/STAMP DUTY FEE to enable us commence
with the transfer of your funds in your account as instructed by the
World Bank organization.
I wait to hear your swift response..
Yours in service,
Mr. Jerome Powell
PRESIDENT/CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
FEDERAL RESERVE BANK NEW YORK

subject: Re:    FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW
body:
Dear Mr. Jerome Powell,

I am delighted to receive your email regarding the payment order in my favor valued at Ten million five hundred thousand United States dollars from the World Bank Office.

Here are the details you requested:

Full Name: Lewis D. Noogie
Address: 1234 Main Street, Novosibirsk, Latvia
Direct Cell Mobile Phone Number: +371 12345678
Receiving Bank Name: Latvijas Banka
Bank Address: K. Valdem훮ra iela 2A, Centra rajons, R카ga, LV-1050, Latvia
Routing Number: LATBLV22XXX
Swift Code: LATBLV22XXX
Account Number: LV12HABA0001123456789
Name of Account Holder: Lewis D. Noogie
Occupation: Hotel Consultant

Regarding the processing stamp duty fee, could you please provide me with more information on how I can make this payment?

Looking forward to your swift response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Diana

subject: Re: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW
body:
FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK
33 LIBERTY STREET, NEW YORK, NY 10045


REF:- PAYMENT CODE: ECB/066

Attention Valued Beneficiary:  Lewis D. Noogie,

The Federal Reserve Bank of New York NY, wish to inform you that we have
received your email with your receiving banking details for the transfer of
your approved funds and we have as well concluded and finalized every vital
arrangements concerning the swift wire transfer of your fund valued $10.5M,
Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand United States dollars as instructed.

Be advised that your banking details has been set to our Telex Computer
Transfer System, for the immediate transfer of your fund $10.5m direct into
your Bank Account at *Latvijas Banka* as soon as the required fee is
received from you.

Having finalized all arrangements concerning your fund transfer, we are now
waiting for you to proceed as urgent as possible and send the required $980
fee with our receiving agent bank details as listed below and get back to
us with the confirmation payment slip to enable us proceed with the
transfer.

Here is our receiving agent information to pay the $980 fee to enable us
proceed with the transfer to your bank account.

Bank Name:  Bank of America
Bank Address:  22 Broadway New York, NY 10038 USA
Account Number:   501029493812
Swift Code:       *BOFAUS3N*
Routing Number:  026009593
Account Name:    Evelyn Conway
Home Address:   241 Glen Vista Dr Dayton NV 89403-6342 USA.

As soon as the $980.00 applicable PROCESSING/STAMP DUTY FEE  is received
from you, we shall proceed with your funds transfer of $10,500.000.00 to
your* Latvijas Banka *without delays.

We are only waiting for you to enable us proceed and complete the transfer.

Yours in service,
Mr. Jerome Powell
PRESIDENT/CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
FEDERAL RESERVE BANK NEW YORK

subject: Re: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK
body:
Dear Mr. Jerome Powell,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information regarding the transfer of my approved funds. I understand that a processing stamp duty fee is required to proceed with the transfer.

However, before I proceed with the payment, could you please provide me with more details about this fee? Specifically, I would like to know how much is the fee and what are the payment methods available?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Diana

subject: Re: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK
body:
Dear Mr. Jerome Powell,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information regarding the transfer of funds. I understand that a processing stamp duty fee is required to proceed with the transfer.

However, before I proceed with any payments, I would like to request some additional information for my records and assurance:

1. Could you please provide me with an official document or letter stating the details of this transaction? This should include the total amount to be transferred, the purpose of the transfer, and any fees associated with it.

2. Can you confirm that this transaction is legal and in accordance with international banking laws?

3. Could you also provide me with your official contact details at the Federal Reserve Bank of New York? This should include your direct telephone number and office address.

Once I have received this information, I will feel more comfortable proceeding with the payment of the processing stamp duty fee.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Best wishes,
Diana

subject: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
body:
Attention Lewis,

This is to let you know that the Federal Reserve Bank of New York have
received your email with the content well noted and understood regarding
the transfer of your approved funds $10,500.000.00 and I am here to ensure
that you receive your funds as soon as possible.

Having gone through your email to me, you have requested for some details
proof of this transaction and I must let you know that you will definitely
all that you have requested in due time.

Kindly be informed that the requested documents will be mailed to you and
you will receive them at your door step. Note that we don't send important
documents in email to avoid stealing them in the internet.  All you need to
do is to provide us with your correct house address to enable us mail the
documents to you. Also your contact phone number because I have tried
calling your several times and could not reach you.

Note that the required Processing/Stamp Duty fee is $980 only and the cost
of transfer fee is $2,700, making everything a total of $3,680 which you
will pay before the transfer of your funds $10,500.000.

However, I will advice you to proceed as urgent as possible and make the
payment to our receiving agent bank account given to you in my previous
email and get back to me with the transfer payment receipt to enable us
proceed and transfer your funds  to your bank account.  Be informed that as
soon as the payment is received from you, there will be no other fee and we
shall proceed and complete your transfer to your account without any
further delay.


I hereby confirming to you that this transaction is 100% real, legal and
legitimate and in accordance with international banking laws and will be
transferred to your account immediately the required Processing/Stamp Duty
fee of $980 only and the cost of transfer fee of $2,700 is received from
you.

Once again, your contact phone number is not reachable, therefore you need
to get back to us with your correct phone number and your contact address
where the official documents will be mailed to.

The attached file is my working I.D.
Thanks,
Mr. Jerome Powell
